Uses of Interface
explicit.DTMC

  • Packages that use DTMC 
    Package Description
    explicit
    Explicit-state probabilistic model checking engine, implemented in Java, and quantitative abstraction refinement techniques (see QuantAbstractRefine).
    explicit.modelviews  
    explicit.rewards  

    • Uses of DTMC in explicit

      Subinterfaces of DTMC in explicit 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CTMC
      Interface for classes that provide (read) access to an explicit-state CTMC.
      Classes in explicit that implement DTMC 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CTMCSimple
      Simple explicit-state representation of a CTMC.
      class  DTMCEmbeddedSimple
      Simple explicit-state representation of a DTMC, constructed (implicitly) as the embedded DTMC of a CTMC.
      class  DTMCExplicit
      Base class for explicit-state representations of a DTMC.
      class  DTMCFromMDPAndMDStrategy
      Explicit-state representation of a DTMC, constructed (implicitly) from an MDP and a memoryless deterministic (MD) adversary.
      class  DTMCFromMDPMemorylessAdversary
      Explicit-state representation of a DTMC, constructed (implicitly) from an MDP and a memoryless adversary, specified as an array of integer indices.
      class  DTMCSimple
      Simple explicit-state representation of a DTMC.
      class  DTMCSparse
      Sparse matrix (non-mutable) explicit-state representation of a DTMC.
      class  DTMCUniformisedSimple
      Simple explicit-state representation of a DTMC, constructed (implicitly) as the uniformised DTMC of a CTMC.

      A view of a DTMC where for selected states the transitions are changed.

      Base class for a DTMC view, i.e., a virtual DTMC that is obtained by mapping from some other model on-the-fly.
